Uses of Class
game.Character

  • Packages that use Character 
    Package Description
    game  

    • Uses of Character in game

      Methods in game that return Character 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Character MyView.getCharacter()
      Returns the 'Character' class instance.
      Character mouseMovement.getCharacter()
      Returns the 'character' instance.
      Methods in game with parameters of type Character 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MyView.setCharacter(Character character)
      Changes the 'Character' class instance.
      Constructors in game with parameters of type Character 
      Constructor and Description
      Collision(Character character, PowerUp powerUp, Time time, Score score)
      Initialises the various instances of the BallTest, Boxes and Rectangle classes as well as indicating the position these instances will start within the game window.
      ControlPanel(GameLevel world, Character character, Time time, Game game, MyView view, Score highscore)
      Creates new form ControlPanel.
      Restart(GameLevel world, Character character, Time time, Game game, MyView view, Score highscore)
      Constructs a declared and linked instances of GameLevel, Character, Time, Game, MyView and Score classes to the initialised instances in the other classes.
